spec_data.Name: libva-intel-hybrid-driver
spec_data.Description:
libva-intel-hybrid-driver is the VA-API implementation for Intel G45 chipsets
and Intel HD Graphics for Intel Core processor family.

It allows to accelerate VP9 videos on Skylake and Kabylake architectures.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 21 Aug 2017 03:39:10 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: VA driver for Intel G45 & HD Graphics family
